entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
